entry.title: Upgrading Learning and Certification Abilities - "Virtual Learning Currency"?
entry.content:
Learning leaders, I know, SAP employees may have the opportunity for 4 certification exam attempts per year. And I assume, SAP partners' and customers' employees may have similar allotted numbers of exam attempts. But what if their employees wanted to learn more and get certified for a broader array of topics? In today's environment where generative AI appears to be at the verge of becoming "general AI" or a superintelligence, having a broad set of certified expertise and experiences may contribute to keeping human employees valuable, valued, and employed. As experts we need to evolve from depth in one topic to depth in multiple topics, linked by a layer of social and professional communication skills, perhaps a few other "soft" skills (coaching, facilitating, strategizing, OCM). 

In the light of this necessary ambition for continued professional self-improvement, how might SAP Learning allow for employees to increase the number of certification exam attempts? I wonder if frequent and acknowledged contributors to the SAP Community (for example) might be able to acquire some 'learning currency', or tokens of some kind they could exchange for certification attempts. Thank you for your consideration.

entry.title: Haven’t received digital badge (UID already set up)
entry.content:
Yesterday I had successfully passed the certification for SAP Certified Associate- SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Private Edition,Management Accounting and yet haven’t received the email from the digital badge and it also hasn’t appeared on my certification list.

I had setup my universal ID and previously passed another exam with different topic and the digital badge was immediately sent to my email

And I already raise the ticket about this issue with the reference number 5000164860 and no response yet

entry.title: Official certification guide and on on-line documentation contradiction about Hyper Care
entry.content:
Hi,

I found a contradiction on the documentation for preparing certification.
In Discovering SAP Activate Agile Project delivery, one of the quiz question is the following:

 

In the SAP Activate Project Management Certification Guide book there is this image:

and, dealing with deliverables of Deploy phase, it is stated:
“The purpose of this deliverable is to provide the hypercare support during the deploy phase post-go-live. It will help improve the system performance before handing over the solution to the operations team.”

Someone can help me understand which of the two documentations is the most trustworthy one?

entry.title: Am I Prepared for the C_LCNC_2406 Exam? Looking for Final Tips!
entry.content:
Hi everyone!

I'm getting ready to take the C_LCNC_2406 – SAP Certified Associate - Low-Code/No-Code Developer exam and would really appreciate some input from those who've been through it.

Here's what my prep looks like so far:

  • Completed BTP100 & BTP110 (Citizen Development fundamentals)
  • Finished APP400, SPA400, and WZ400 courses
  • Gained hands-on experience with SAP Build Apps, Process Automation, and Work Zone
  • Scored around 70–75% on mock tests
  • Using P2PCerts practice questions, which have been helpful for understanding the format and question style

Based on your experience, does this sound like solid prep?
Are there any key topics I should review again or any additional resources you’d recommend?

Thanks in advance for any tips or insights — especially from those who’ve passed recently!

entry.title: No certification even after a week of exam and support ticket
entry.content:
Hi

Attempted exam on 19th May 2025, still no response about the certificate.

Support ID details:

5000163552
In Process
Certificate
2025-05-21 15:54:12

Is there any alternative to escalate the query? Having tried the Chat and Call center with no results.

Thanks in advance,

Sam

entry.title: Passed C_SIGBT_2409 – Seeking Advice on Next SAP Certification
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I’m happy to share that I’ve passed the SAP Certified Associate - Business Transformation Consultant (C_SIGBT_2409) exam.

For my preparation, I relied on a combination of trusted resources:

  • Official SAP Materials – including SAP Learning Hub, SAP Signavio documentation, and relevant OpenSAP courses, which provided a strong foundation in process intelligence, modeling, and integration topics

  • P2Pcerts – offered well-structured practice tests and scenario-based questions that helped assess and reinforce my readiness

  • Community Resources – such as YouTube tutorials and SAP Community blogs, which gave practical insights and real-world examples

My focus areas included the SAP Signavio suite, business process governance, transformation strategies, and integration with SAP S/4HANA.

Now, I’m looking to continue building on this knowledge. Could you recommend a suitable next certification, ideally aligned with business transformation, process excellence, or SAP S/4HANA?

entry.content:

I attempted multiple times to purchase the SAP Certification in the Cloud for 500€ (6 attempts), but I receive the message:

Can you please assist or confirm whether my region requires going through a local partner?

Best regards,
Ndubuisi

entry.title: Questionmark secure browser crashing
entry.content:
Hello everybody,

it seems the Questionmark secure browser has a few problems. When I try to launch it for an actual exam (the sample assessment works), the Windows session fulfills all criteria, I get the following error in the Windows Application Log:

Faulting application name: Questionmark Secure for Windows Desktop.exe, version: 6.1.59.5, time stamp: 0x674071c0
Faulting module name: KERNELBASE.dll, version: 10.0.26100.4343, time stamp: 0x677e8431
Exception code: 0xe0434352
Fault offset: 0x0015f4c4

Faulting application path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Questionmark\QS\Questionmark Secure for Windows Desktop.exe
Faulting module path: C:\WINDOWS\System32\KERNELBASE.dll
Report Id: 6522047c-df9b-4afc-a912-34aa1e029e6b
Faulting package full name:
Faulting package-relative application ID:

 

Application: Questionmark Secure for Windows Desktop.exe
Framework Version: v4.0.30319
Description: The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception.
Exception Info: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException
at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]].get_Item(System.__Canon)

at System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]..ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<System.__Canon>)
at System.Linq.Enumerable.ToList[[System.__Canon, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]](System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<System.__Canon>)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.QmsbApplication.ProcessBlackListCheck(Boolean, Boolean)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.App.OnStartup(System.Windows.StartupEventArgs)
at System.Windows.Application.<.ctor>b__1_0(System.Object)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.InternalRealCall(System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.TryCatchWhen(System.Object, System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32, System.Delegate)
at System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.InvokeImpl()
at System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.InvokeInSecurityContext(System.Object)
at MS.Internal.CulturePreservingExecutionContext.CallbackWrapper(System.Object)
at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(System.Threading.ExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object, Boolean)
at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(System.Threading.ExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object, Boolean)
at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run(System.Threading.ExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object)
at MS.Internal.CulturePreservingExecutionContext.Run(MS.Internal.CulturePreservingExecutionContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback, System.Object)
at System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Invoke()
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ProcessQueue()
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.WndProcHook(IntPtr, Int32, IntPtr, IntPtr, Boolean ByRef)
at MS.Win32.HwndWrapper.WndProc(IntPtr, Int32, IntPtr, IntPtr, Boolean ByRef)
at MS.Win32.HwndSubclass.DispatcherCallbackOperation(System.Object)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.InternalRealCall(System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32)
at System.Windows.Threading.ExceptionWrapper.TryCatchWhen(System.Object, System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32, System.Delegate)
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.LegacyInvokeImpl(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority, System.TimeSpan, System.Delegate, System.Object, Int32)
at MS.Win32.HwndSubclass.SubclassWndProc(IntPtr, Int32, IntPtr, IntPtr)
at MS.Win32.UnsafeNativeMethods.DispatchMessage(System.Windows.Interop.MSG ByRef)
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrameImpl(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame)
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrame(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame)
at System.Windows.Application.RunDispatcher(System.Object)
at System.Windows.Application.RunInternal(System.Windows.Window)
at System.Windows.Application.Run(System.Windows.Window)
at QM.QSB4WindowsDesktop.App.Main()

I have tried it with local admin accounts, non-admin accounts, and even accounts which are not subjected to security policies, to no avail. I'm running Windows 11 on a current patch level.

Of course, SAP and or examity.com do not allow iPads for SAP exams.

Is there a way SAP or Examity could open a proper support ticket at the publisher Learnosity, and/or supply a test tool with which we can test whether a session on Windows fulfills the requirements?

Regards,

René

entry.title: Help Booking SAP S/4HANA Asset Management Certification as a Student
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m a student currently trying to book the SAP S/4HANA Asset Management certification exam. I’ve already created my SAP Learning account and received my P-user ID.

When I click “Book Exam,” I’m prompted to get a subscription. Out of the three options, I selected the free student subscription, completed the onboarding form, received the confirmation email, and successfully enrolled in a course as a student.

However, I’m still unable to schedule a certification exam—the booking option remains unavailable, and I don’t see a way to proceed from the student dashboard.

I have already raised a technical support case regarding this issue, but it’s been five days with no resolution.

Any guidance or help from the community or SAP support team would be much appreciated!

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: C_S4CFI_2504 Schedule Exam is grayed out even though I have completed the course outline
entry.content:
This is about a recent issue I encountered on SAP Learning Hub related to the C_S4CFI_2504 certification exam.

Previously, the exam could be scheduled without any prerequisites. However, within the past month, a new requirement was introduced mandating the completion of a practical test before scheduling the exam. While I understand and support the importance of ensuring expertise, the sudden implementation of this requirement came without prior notification.

Despite this, I completed the necessary practical test. However, the system seems to have reset my progress, and the “Schedule Exam” button is now greyed out. When I attempt to retake the practical test, I receive a message stating that the content has been updated and the page needs to be refreshed. Unfortunately, refreshing the page does not resolve the issue, and the test does not complete—even though I had successfully completed it before.

Has someone experienced the same? If yes, what did you do? 
SAP Learning Hub  SAP S/4HANA Finance Certification

entry.title: Is the "SAP Certified Associate - SAP Generative AI Developer" certification a solid entry point?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I saw that SAP recently released the SAP Certified Associate - SAP Generative AI Developer certification. I’m currently exploring how to get started with AI from a technical perspective, and this certification caught my attention. I’m curious to know if it could be a practical and valuable entry point.

Here’s what I’m looking for:

  • Feedback from anyone who has taken or started preparing for this certification.
  • Whether the developer tools, frameworks, and APIs related to SAP’s Generative AI are production-ready or still evolving.
  • Your thoughts on whether this certification will hold value from a technical and practical perspective over the next few years.

I’m absolutely fine if the offering is still maturing, I just want to avoid diving in too early if it’s not yet relevant for developers.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts and experiences!

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP certificate not received after passing the certification
entry.content:
I have recently given my SAP exam on SAP Certified Associate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Management Accounting Exam on 10.08.2025 with SAP certification ID: C_TS4CO_2023. But I have not received any mail of digital badge download.

I have already passed the exam with 78% but I am yet to receive the certificate. I have also raised a ticket 5000199873 but there is no response yet from the support team.

I am little bit worried now because this is the 2nd certificate which I have given exam now, for the first certificate I have received it within few minutes after completing.

Can anyone from SAP community please help me what should I do know. Any contacts will help me as well.

Thanks & Regards,
Koustav

entry.title: Is SAP Certified Associate - SAP HCM for SAP ECC or SAP S/4HANA (C_P2W12_2311) retired or not?
entry.content:
When checking out the available certifications on the website, you can not longer find it.

Nonetheless, in the exam dashboard you can still schedule an exam for C_P2W12_2311?

entry.title: Looking for Updated SAP C_THR88_2505 Practice Questions 2025?
entry.content:

If you’ve used any trusted platforms that provide realistic mock exams reflecting the actual test difficulty and structure, please share your suggestions. I’d love to focus on high quality material that truly makes a difference in passing.

Thanks a lot for your help!

entry.content:

Could you kindly advise which payment methods are supported for my country(India) and guide me on the best way to proceed with the payment?

I would greatly appreciate your assistance.

Warm regards,

Mohamad Inayath
